name: Zombie Killtime
description: Zombie Killtime is a fast-paced, action-packed, zombie platform shooter with 4 player coop gameplay. Survive against endless waves of zombies with your friends as you upgrade your guns and earn new ones.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Anything after 2004 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Zombie Killtime is a game that I can't recommend because: - the price is too much for it's quality - it is boring - it has a lot of issues - it crashes all the time - it cannot be saved - the only good reason to install this game is for the trading cards
its cool!!! you got so many things to buy you can make your own lvl and its very fun!! btw i like how it says waiting for awesomeness
